author: wildwill
title: Bought this at Legoland California - Nice Army Builder
review:
At $15 you're paying $3 a mini-fig, which I guess is as good a price as you're going to get.  Three of the figures are repeated from the Captain's Cabin set (Jack and the two zombies) while "Scrum" comes from the WHitecap Bay set and the King's Soldier (or Lt. Theodore Grove) comes from the London Escape set.  If you want an army of Zombies you get two here, and another English soldier is never a bad thing.


I just wish they'd come with stands.

author: ChristopherS
title: Potc Battle Pack
review:
It is a nice Battle pack with 5 figures...

Jack sparrow:
Nice figure...Super Hair Peace...He has a double sided Head a scared one And a normal face. Jack just comes with Gun. But he is still a good figure. He appears in the "the Mill" Set. "Fountin of youth" set. And the "Captians Cabin"  Set.

Scrum: 
He is a nice figure too...very good printing on his legs and his torso. He comes
With a torch. Not with a sword! But still good...He appears in the "White cap Bay" Set.

Gunner Zombie:
Cool figure...comes with a sword...nice printing on his head and on his body. He looks almost exactly like the real gunner zombie. He appears in allot of sets. The "Captians Cabin" Set. In the " QAR" Set and the "White cap bay" Set.

Yeoman Zombie:
He is my favorite figure out of this set. He comes with sword and double sided head a normal/scared face and angry face. I love his angry face because he has very neat teeth. He has a very rare black hair peace. God printing on his body. He also appears in the " Captians cabin" Set and he appears in the "QAR" Set.

English Soldier
Nice figure...comes with a sword. Has nice printing on his body and comes with plain white legs. Has a cool looking hat with a red feather. He only appears in the "London Escape" Set.

You get 5 very good figures for a very good price(14.99$) (9.99â‚¬)
Its Great Set for all Potc Fans...

Hope my Review was helpfull.
:-)
